QuestData.Title: The Deed Is Done
QuestData.Description: <You shield your eyes from the blast and the debris as the mine implodes onto itself.>$B$B<General Twinbraid will be pleased, but somehow you doubt it'll be enough to quench his thirst for vengeance.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to General Twinbraid at Twinbraid's Patrol in Southern Barrens.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to General Twinbraid at Twinbraid's Patrol in Southern Barrens.
QuestData.RewardText: <Twinbraid nods as you describe the destruction of the mine, but his eyes still burn with rage.>$B$BVery nice work, $n. I suppose there's some strategic value in depriving the Horde of those minerals, but I'd have done it anyway just to crush those little green monstrosities.
